narrative.title: 3Rd Infantry Division - 1943Q1
narrative.situation: American Infantry Division (Triangular) deployed in North Africa during 1943Q1.
narrative.objectives: Infantry division for offensive and defensive operations in mountainous terrain
narrative.axis_objective: Hold current positions and prevent Allied breakthrough.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and neutralize Axis defensive positions.
